122.content:
The good news was that after years of studying and saving up to be able to be selected into the prestigious Duel Academy, you'd finally made it. Not only that, but you'd aced the entrance exam. Sorted directly into Obelisk Blue from day one. Well, your parents were very proud anyway. For you, the bad news was that the whole place seemed very daunting. Everyone around you was an expert duellist, while at home you were untouchable. It reminded you of your very first duel. Somehow you'd always had an excellent intuition for duelling that you couldn't explain - in fact your parents told you that you were duelling with the cards before you learnt to count. It just came so easily to you.

Dragging your loud suitcase through the lavish corridors of Obelisk Blue, you soon found your room - which, honestly, seemed more like a palace to you. Mirrors, cool paintings - you even thought you caught a glimpse of the dining room. Such luxury and opulence as you'd only seen in movies. It was almost as cool as duelling, but you still felt very out of place. You were used to the grimy suburbs of your hometown, the turf you ruled with your uncanny knack for winning card games. Here you felt like you were just a novice, like a fish out of the water. Even your fresh blue uniform, though pretty cool-looking, felt awkward and uncomfortable compared to the torn shirts and jeans you were accustomed to.

Soon you set down your things in your new room and relaxed on your mammoth bed with your deck of cards. You were sure the bed was at least the size of your former house! You'd always dreamt of making lots of money in tournaments to help out your family... you guessed, perhaps, that this could be your break. You went over and over your cards, admiring your talent for always drawing the cards you needed from your deck. Although foreign and alien, at least you figured you were now among duellists who might be able to offer you a challenge again.

With a smile, therefore, you shuffled your deck and headed out of your room, intending to make for the dining room.

"Hey, watch where you're going!" said a cute blue-haired young girl, bumping into you. She was wearing a red vest, which was weird, but it suited her.
"Oh! Sorry!" you replied, collecting yourself.

"That's ok, you must be new here. I'm Blair." said Blair, shaking your hand "You must be pretty impressive if you made it all the way to Obelisk Blue from your entrance exam. Especially since you don't look much older than me."
"I guess you could say that" you replied shyly.
"Come on - you've got to work on your ego" joked Blair "Everyone knows trash talking is half the battle! How about you and I have a duel, right now? I'd like to test you out!"

"Oh, uhm, right here in the corridor?"
"Of course! You can duel anywhere you like in this school."
"Ok then..."

"Then it's agreed - let's duel!" yelled Blair "While you get your cards shuffled, I think I'll start this show by summoning Shining Angel in face-up attack mode! I doubt you've got the skills to take down his 1400 attack points, but just in case, I'll set two cards face down."

"Alright" you reply "My move! I summon Rockstone Warrior in attack mode! Rockstone warrior has 1800 attack points - more than enough to take down your Warrior Lady of the Wasteland. Rockstone warrior, send her lady straight to the graveyard!"

"Not bad" shrugged Blair as her life points went down to 3600 "But that's what I wanted you to do! Shining Angel, activate your special ability now! When he's destroyed, I get to summon a light monster with 1500 attack points or less directly from my deck. I choose ... Maiden in Love!"

"So ... you swapped out your angel for an even weaker monster? Your maiden only has 400 attack points."
"You sure have a lot to learn. Now it's my turn! I draw! First I activate my trap card, Defense Maiden! This prevents you from attacking any of my monsters except my Maiden in Love!"
"I don't think I was planning to. Your maiden is looking pretty vulnerable there."
"I wouldn't be so sure. Next I activate my other trap card, Magician's Defense! Let me explain. To use Magician's Defense, I need to control a spellcaster-type monster. Right now I have my Maiden in Love on the field. So long as I do, any battle damage I take is halved. But my Maiden won't be alone for long ... I summon The Unhappy Girl in face-up attack mode!"
"You have a thing for girls with 400 attack points, don't you?"
"Alright then, come on! Try attack me! I'll just set one more card face-down and end my turn."

"No problem" you replied, drawing another card "Rockstone warrior! Destroy her Maiden in Love!"
"Oh yeah, I forgot to mention" smirked Blair "Maiden in Love has a special ability - she can't be destroyed as a result of battle while she's in attack mode. Don't forget about my magician's defense either, halving the damage I take from the battle. But that's not all! I activate my trap card, Enchanted Javelin! This increases my life points by your attacking monster's attack points. So although I lose 700 life points in battle damage, I gain 1800 life points, putting me on... 4700, right?"
"I'll just end my turn by setting one card face-down then" you said, disappointed.

"Sorry, stud, you've got to be good if you want to keep up with me!" cheered Blair as she drew "I equip my Unhappy Girl with this card - Cupid's Kiss! When I take battle damage from any battle involving The Unhappy Girl from a monster that has battled my Maiden in Love, I get to take control of that monster! Plus, did I mention that my Unhappy Girl can't be destroyed by battle while she's in face-up attack mode either?"
"So that means..." you replied, worried.
"That's right! Go my Unhappy Girl! Make his Rockstone Warrior fall in love with you!"
"Oh no!" you cried as you watched Blair's life points go down to 4000 again, and your Rockstone Warrior marching off to her side of the field to stand beside her Unhappy Maiden.
"Now, Rockstone Warrior and Maiden in Love! Attack his life points directly!"
"Argh!" you cried in pain as your life points dropped to 1800.
"One more turn and it's all over" chuckled Blair "You don't have enough life points to withstand one more attack from your Rockstone warrior. So I'll just put down one face-down card too and end my turn."

"You're as good at duelling as you are cute!" you said, impressed "But now the time for playing around is finished! I activate the magic card - Dark Hole! Your monsters may be impervious to being destroyed by battle, but not card effects! All your monsters are destroyed!"
"Nooo!" whined Blair as her monsters went into the graveyard.
"Next I use another spell card, Call of the Mummy! Now I can special summon a zombie-type monster from my hand, so long as I have no monsters on the field. Since I have no monsters on the field, I use Call of the Mummy to summon Zombie Master from my hand!"
"Eww! Gross!"
"Zombie Master has 1800 attack points - ugly, but effective. Next, I remove my Rockstone Warrior from my graveyard to special summon The Rock Spirit from my hand! He's not a zombie monster, but his 1700 attack points are still an earth-shattering force! Finally, I normal summon my Immortal Ruler! He's a zombie too, with 1800 awesome attack points! Altogether, 1800 plus 1800 plus 1700 ... I think that comes to ... oh yeah, more than enough damage to take out your life points."

"Uh oh"

"Go my monsters! Attack her life points now and end this duel!"
"I activate my face-down trap card, Negate Attack!" yelled Blair "Your battle phase ends now! I'm still in this duel!"
"I don't think so! I chain my trap card, Seven Tools of the Bandit! By paying 1000 life points, I negate the activation of your trap card! It's all over!" you replied while your life points dropped to 800.
"Argh!" she screamed as she fell backwards dramatically, giving you a great view of her panties, and her life points dropped to zero.

"Hey" you said, offering your hand to help her up "That was a really good duel."
"Wow" she replied as you helped her to her feet "Yeah, you... you're incredible."

For a moment the two of you stared into each others eyes. She seemed different now that you'd beaten her.

"You remind me of someone" she said "I've only met one duellist who's captivated me in quite this way before..."
"I've never met anyone like you" you replied "So beautiful ... and talented ... it's been years since I've been challenged like that."
"Really? I'd have thought rock and zombie aren't exactly types that go together" mused Blair "I can see why they put you in Obelisk Blue."
"Would you like to show me where I can find some dinner around here, maybe?" you asked.

The next day you followed Akiza without her knowing so as to protect her if the giant lizard showed up. Sayer appeared behind you but you didn't even acknowledge him. Sayr just gave up and left. You kept watching over Akiza to make sure the giant lizard didn't show up and attack her.

It had been one week and when you were following Akiza out in the streets she just turned round and said
"Okay it was flattering at first but now it's annoying. Why are you following me?"
You poked your head round the corner of the alley you were hiding in and you saw and angry Akiza so you walked over to her and apologised.
"Geez," she said "If you wanted to hang out with me so much you could've just asked. You could've moved into my room since yours is a one person room."
You looked up and asked if you could and Akiza said yes but you had to do as she said until the fortune cup started. You accepted those conditions and Akiza and you walked back to the Arcadia Movement building.

Akiza helped you move your stuff up into her room and she had a double bed.
"Don't get any ideas." Akiza said "That time was a one-off. You're sleeping on the couch."
You looked sad but accepted the conditions.
It was late so you both went to sleep.

The next morning you had a bad back and you couldn't move your body. You opened your eyes and saw Akiza lying on top of you. She must have pulled off the blanket, got on top of you then put the blanket back over you two. You didn't want to wake her so you gently carried her back to her double bed and put her back in it. You looked on the table and Akiza had left you a few chores to do. She must've written them before getting on the couch with you. You began to do the chores.
131121111121211.title: Protecting

1311211111212111.content: After an hour of chores Akiza woke up and noticed that you were done. She was amazed at the time it took you to do them. Normally it would take someone three hours to complete that list. She knew it had something to do with your powers. As she was looking around for you she saw you doing push-ups on your right pointer finger while your body is hanging up-side down. She was staring at you with lust when you used your strength to push yourself into the air and back flip onto your feet. "Akiza, I know your back there." you said. Then Akiza started to blush and came out of her hiding place. "Funny. Now we have both spied on eachother." She laughed at the fact that it was completely true. Soon th e rest oof the day went by when the two of you realised that the fortune cup was tomorrow. So the two of you got your decks ready. But then you pulled out a duel disk that looked like an ancient egyptian version of the duel disk. Soon the two of you went to bed with you on the couch again.
1311211111212111.title: Akiza wakes up

13112111112121111.content:
The AM truck reached the stadium and you and Akiza got onto the stage.

It was time for the first duel. It was a "girl?" called Luna against the big dude Greigar. You watched it and saw that Greigar was a powerful foe. The duel was quick and the "girl?" called Luna was weak. The next duel was Akiza VS Sir Ransborg. Before the duel you were chatting with Akiza.
"Do you think I should wear the mask?" asked Akiza
"It's your choice but it won't matter they will know you are the Black Rose Witch unless you learn to control your powers. Just try to hold them back." you said
"Whatever." said Akiza

In Goodwin's observation tower, Ransborg was talking with Goodwin.
"So let me get this straight." said Ransborg "you want me to duel this woman, for your unknown reasons. Sorry but I can't do that because it is against my chivalry."
"What if I told you she's the Black Rose Witch?" asked Goodwin
"I'LL MURDER THE BITCH!"

It was time for the duel. You watched with intrest but knowing how it would turn out.

20 minutes later Ransborg was defeated.
"Poor fool didn't even stand a chance." you said to yourself
13112111112121111.title: Two duels

131121111121211111.content: It was your turn for a duel. Your opponent was a machine duelist. It didn't take long to destroy his entire stratagy. It only took one trap card; DNA Surgury. You changed your entire deck into dragon types. His deck was thrown so far out of whack he couldn't do any damage to your life points. You defeated him with no difficulty. once you defeated him it was almost Akiza's duel with Yusei. You wished her luck and she then kissed you on the lips. But before her duel Yusei would have to get past Greiger. He had quite a lot of trouble at first, but Yusei managed to pull out a win. It was time for Akiza's duel with Yusei.
131121111121211111.title: Past vs Future

1311211111212111111.content:
Yusei and Akiza were about to duel. Akiza grabbed her mask and was about to leave but you grabbed her.
"Don't hid behind a mask Akiza." you said "It will make all of the people think they are succeding in putting you down. Don't let fear rule your life."
Akiza brushed you off and left.
"Yusei," you thought to yourself "Please get through to her."

(This time since it's an actual duel it's going to be up with everything included)
Akiza Summons "Wall of Ivy" in Defense Position (DEF 1200) and Sets 1 card.

Yusei Summons "Speed Warrior" in Attack Position (ATK 900). He enters his Battle Phase and uses "Speed Warrior's" effect to double its ATK (ATK 1800). "Speed Warrior" attacks "Wall of Ivy". "Wall of Ivy's" effect Special Summons an "Ivy Token" to Yusei's side of the field. "Wall of Ivy" is destroyed by battle. (NOTE: In the real game, "Wall of Ivy's" effect is a flip affect, so it's effect wouldn't have activated).

Akiza activates her face-down card, "Cursed Ivy", reviving "Wall of Ivy" in Defense Position.

Yusei Tributes "Speed Warrior" for "Turret Warrior" (ATK 1200). "Turret Warrior" gains ATK equal to "Speed Warrior's" (ATK 2100). Yusei attacks "Wall of Ivy" with "Turret Warrior". Another "Ivy Token" is Summoned to Yusei's side of the field. "Turret Warrior" destroys "Wall of Ivy" and two more "Ivy Tokens" are Summoned to Yusei's side, from "Cursed Ivy".

Akiza activates "Seed of Deception" Special Summoning "Dark Verger". Next she Tributed it to Summon "Rose Tentacles". Akiza attacks and destroys "Turret Warrior" and all 4 of Yusei's "Ivy Tokens" with "Rose Tentacles". (Yusei: 1500 Life Points).

Yusei Summons "Shield Warrior" in Defense Position and Sets 2 cards.
"Akiza," said Yusei "I think I know what makes you tick. You enjoy other people's pain."

Akiza activates "Ivy Shackles", turning "Shield Warrior" into a Plant-Type monster. Next, she attacks and destroys "Shield Warrior" with "Rose Tentacles", (Yusei: 1500 -> 1200 Life Points, through Rose Tentacles' Effect) followed with a direct attack from "Rose Tentacles", using its other Effect. - Yusei activates "Card Defense", discarding "Equip Shot" to negate the attack.

Yusei draws "Junk Barrage". He Summons "Junk Synchron" (Level 3) and uses its effect to "Special Summon" "Speed Warrior" (Level 2). - Next, Yusei tunes them to Synchro Summon "Junk Warrior" (Level 5). Yusei equips "Junk Warrior" with "Junk Barrage". Jumk Warrior Attacks and Destroys "Rose Tentacles" (Akiza: 4000 -> 3900 Life Points). Akiza then takes damage from "Junk Barrage's" effect (Akiza: 3900 -> 2800 Life Points).

Akiza begins her turn, so "Ivy Shackles" turns "Junk Warrior" into a Plant. She Summons "Copy Plant", which takes on "Junk Warrior's" Level. (Copy Plant, Level 5) Akiza revives "Dark Verger" (Level 2) using its own effect. Next, she uses her 2 monsters to Synchro Summon "Black Rose Dragon" (Level 7). Then, she uses "Black Rose Dragon's" effect, removing "Wall of Ivy" from play, to reduce "Junk Warrior's" ATK to 0. Black Rose Dragon attacks Junk Warrior. Yusei removes "Shield Warrior" in his Graveyard from play to protect "Junk Warrior", then he activates "Spirit Force", reducing the damage to 0 and adding "Junk Synchron" to his hand. Akiza Sets 2 cards.

Yusei Normal Summons "Junk Synchron" which revives "Speed Warrior" in Defense Position. He tunes "Junk Synchron" (Level 3) to "Junk Warrior" (Level 5) to Synchro Summon "Stardust Dragon". (Level 8) Yusei attacks and destroys "Black Rose Dragon" with "Stardust Dragon".(Akiza: 2800 -> 2700 Life Points).

Akiza activates "Magic Planter" sending "Ivy Shackles" to the Graveyard to draw 2 cards. Next, she activates 1 of her face-down cards, "Wicked Rebirth", bringing back "Black Rose Dragon" by paying 800 Life Points; 2700 -> 1900 Life Points.) Akiza uses its effect to destroy all cards on the field, but Yusei negates it and destroys "Black Rose Dragon" by Tributing "Stardust Dragon" to using its own effect. Akiza Normal Summons "Phoenixian Seed" and Tributes it to Special Summon "Phoenixian Cluster Amaryllis". She attacks and destroys "Speed Warrior" with "Phoenixian Cluster Amaryllis", whose effect destroys itself and inflicts 800 damage to Yusei. (Yusei: 1200 -> 400 Life Points). "Black Rose Dragon", "Phoenixian Cluster Amaryllis" and "Stardust Dragon" are all revived in the End Phase. Akiza activates "Overdoom Line" increasing "Black Rose Dragon's" ATK to 3400.

Yusei switches "Stardust Dragon" to Defense Position. He then activates "Prevention Star" equipping it to "Stardust Dragon" and selects "Phoenixian Cluster Amaryllis" from attacking. Akiza activates "Synchro Back", returning "Black Rose Dragon" to her Extra Deck. Yusei Sets 1 card. ("Cosmic Blast")

"Synchro Back's" Effect Summons "Black Rose Dragon" to Akiza's side of the field. Akiza uses "Black Rose Dragon's" effect to destroy all cards on the field. Yusei negates the effect and destroys "Black Rose Dragon" with "Stardust Dragon". This causes "Prevention Star" to get destroyed. Yusei plays "Cosmic Blast", dealing Stardust Dragon's Attack Points as Damage. (Akiza: 1900 -> 0 Life Points)

(Yusei: 400 Life Points) (Akiza: 0 Life Points)

Yusei wins.

You go over to Akiza and help her up. You look at Yusei and say to him
"Thank you, for helping her."
You put your jacket on Akiza and lead her away.
"Don't forget Yusei," you told Yusei as you walked away. "I'm not going to be so friendly in our duel."
1311211111212111111.title: The Final Game, Heart Hidden Under the Mask

13112111112121111111.content:
It was time for you and Yusei to duel.

(Skipping cause I cannot think of anything)
You had 2500 LP left, Ra with 5000 ATK/DEF, no face downs and no cards in your hand.
Yusei had 100 LP left, Stardust Dragon which has 2500 ATK and 2000 DEF, 2 face downs and 3 cards in your hands.

"It's my turn," you said "Now go Ra, finish him off."
Ra blasted at Stardust Dragon, but Yusei activated a trap card which boosted Stardust Dragon's ATK by Ra's ATK.
You activated a trap card which prevented Ra from being destroyed.
Your LP reached 0.

You went back to the AM truck and Sayer was angry at you.
"WHY DID YOU TRY AND PROTECT YOUR DRAGON INS-?"
"Hey Akiza," you said, interrupting and ignoring Sayer "How are you feeling?"
"Great thanks." she said. "It's nearly time for the final. We should watch it."
"Yeah."
13112111112121111111.title: The Sun VS The Stars

choices: Go back to the AM headquarters
131121111121211111111.content:
Yusei and Jack each have 0 SPC. Yusei Summons "Shield Wing" in face-up Defense Position (DEF/ 900) and Sets 2 cards.

Jack and Yusei each have 1 SPC. Jack Summons "Twin-Sword Marauder" (ATK/ 1600) and uses it to attack "Shield Wing" twice. "Twin-Sword Marauder" inflicts Piercing damage (Yusei: 2600 Life Points) Jack Sets 1 card.

Jack and Yusei each have 2 SPC. Yusei draws "Meteor Stream" and decides to save it for later when Jack least expects it. Instead, he Summons "Junk Synchron" tunes it with "Shield Wing" to Synchro Summon "Junk Warrior". "Junk Warrior" attacks and destroys "Twin-Sword Marauder" (Jack: 3300 Life Points). Yusei activates his face-down card, "Synchro Blast". (Jack: 2800 Life Points)

Jack and Yusei each have 3 SPC. Jack Summons "Dark Tinker" and activates his face-down, "Powerful Rebirth" reviving "Twin-Sword Marauder" and increasing its ATK and DEF by 100 and Level by 1. Jack uses both monsters to Synchro Summon "Red Dragon Archfiend".

Jack and Yusei each have 4 SPC. Yusei activates his Set "Descending Lost Star", reviving "Junk Warrior" in Defense Position, with 0 DEF and 1 less Level (Level 4). He then Normal Summons "Hyper Synchron"(ATK/1600) in Attack Position. He uses both monsters to Synchro Summon "Stardust Dragon" (ATK/2500). Due to "Hyper Synchron's" effect, "Stardust Dragon" gains 800 ATK (ATK/3300) and cannot be destroyed by battle. Jack activates his face-down "Tuner Capture", Special Summoning "Hyper Synchron" to Jack's side of the field in Defense Position. Yusei attacks "Red Dragon Archfiend" with "Stardust Dragon". Jack counters with "Tuner's Mind", returning "Red Dragon Archfiend" to his Extra Deck, reviving "Twin-Sword Marauder" and "Dark Tinker" in Defense Position, and forcing "Stardust Dragon" to attack "Dark Tinker". It destroys it, and Yusei's face-up "Synchro Blast" inflicts 500 damage to Jack. (Jack: 2300) Jack draws a card due to "Dark Tinker's" effect.

Jack and Yusei each have 5 SPC. Jack uses "Twin-Sword Marauder" and "Hyper Synchron" to Synchro Summon "Red Dragon Archfiend", which due to "Hyper Synchron", gains 800 ATK and cannot be destroyed by battle. It attacks "Stardust Dragon", which is not destroyed by battle. (Yusei: 1400) Jack activates "Fiend Cannon". (Yusei: 900). Jack Sets 2 cards.

The birthmarks burning and Ra was shining and you were all transprted somewhere. Yusei and Jack were riding on a beam of light and you, Akiza and Luna were all on bubbles following them. You all saw a temple reaching to the sky. They all had dragon birthmarks. Then you saw the satellite being.
The duel continued.

Jack draws a card due to "Dark Tinker's" effect. He then attacks and destroys "Junk Warrior" with "Red Dragon Archfiend". (Yusei: 1900 Life Points). Jack Sets 3 cards.

Jack and Yusei each have 4 SPC. Yusei activates his Set "Descending Lost Star", reviving "Junk Warrior" in Defense Position, with 0 DEF and 1 less Level (Level 4). He then Normal Summons "Hyper Synchron"(ATK/1600) in Attack Position. He uses both monsters to Synchro Summon "Stardust Dragon" (ATK/2500). Due to "Hyper Synchron's" effect, "Stardust Dragon" gains 800 ATK (ATK/3300) and cannot be destroyed by battle. Jack activates his face-down "Tuner Capture", Special Summoning "Hyper Synchron" to Jack's side of the field in Defense Position. Yusei attacks "Red Dragon Archfiend" with "Stardust Dragon". Jack counters with "Tuner's Mind", returning "Red Dragon Archfiend" to his Extra Deck, reviving "Twin-Sword Marauder" and "Dark Tinker" in Defense Position, and forcing "Stardust Dragon" to attack "Dark Tinker". It destroys it, and Yusei's face-up "Synchro Blast" inflicts 500 damage to Jack. (Jack: 2300) Jack draws a card due to "Dark Tinker's" effect.

Jack and Yusei each have 5 SPC. Jack uses "Twin-Sword Marauder" and "Hyper Synchron" to Synchro Summon "Red Dragon Archfiend", which due to "Hyper Synchron", gains 800 ATK and cannot be destroyed by battle. It attacks "Stardust Dragon", which is not destroyed by battle. (Yusei: 1400) Jack activates "Fiend Cannon". (Yusei: 900). Jack Sets 2 cards.

Jack and Yusei each have 6 SPC. Yusei activates "Speed Spell - Silver Contrails", increasing "Stardust Dragon's" ATK by 1000. He attacks "Red Dragon Archfiend", which is not destroyed by battle. (Jack 1800) "Synchro Blast's" effect activates (Jack: 1300). Yusei Sets 3 cards.

Jack and Yusei each have 7 SPC. Jack attacks "Stardust Dragon" with "Red Dragon Archfiend" (Yusei 400). Yusei activates "Cross Line Counter" selecting "Stardust Dragon" (ATK/4300) (Jack: 800). Jack activates "Speed Spell - Overboost, giving him 4 SPC (11 SPC), and then activates "Speed Spell - The End of the Storm". Yusei chains "Stardust Dragon's" effect, Tributing it to negate and destroy "Speed Spell - The End of the Storm". Jack activates "Sneak Exploder". During the End Phase, "Stardust Dragon" revives itself. Yusei activates "Meteor Stream", but Jack uses "Crimson Fire", negating the damage and inflicting double the amount he negated to Yusei. In response, Yusei activates "Shining Silver Force", negating the damage, and destroying all of Jack's Spell and Trap Cards. Jack's SPC becomes 1 due to "Speed Spell - Overboost.

Jack has 2 Speed Counters and Yusei has 8 speed counters. Yusei activates "Speed Spell - Final Attack", selecting "Stardust Dragon" ATK (ATK/5000) and attacks "Red Dragon Archfiend". (Jack 0)

Yusei wins.

The future looked grim and you knew that something bad was going to happen.
131121111121211111111.title: Stardust vs Red Demons

1311211111212111111111.content: Shortly after you and Akiza had settled down back at the AM headquartes, the sky grew dark and purple lightning began to light the sky. "What in the world is going on?" you thought to yourself. Just then the entire building started to shake. You looked outside and saw a Lizard around the building, similar to the spider you and Akiza saw in the vision. Akiza wasn't in the room so you went to look for her. Shortly after the building started to shake again. This time there was a Hummingbird around the building. You knew that the entire AM was in trouble. You were looking for Akiza as fast as you could and eventually found her. She was dueling someone with a lizard on her arm. You also saw the Black Rose Dragon turned to stone. You knew instantly that it was Misty the Reptile duelist. Ran up behind Akiza and she told you stay back. You listened to her until you heard Misty summon her Earthbound Immortal. Both you and Akiza were looking for it but then you both turned around and saw the monster's eye. You were both terrified of that demonic lizard. But as Misty was about to attack the upper part of the building began to crumble. Then you both saw Sayer fall to his doom. Misty then made a hasty retreat. As the building was about to collaps on Akiza you used your power to get her out of the way. She was knocked out so you picked her up in her arms and got to your duel runner. As you left you saw the AM building completely collaps. So you wad no choice but to get Akiza to the nearest hospital.
1311211111212111111111.title: Rise of Darkness

choices: The orange sun vs The black rose
13112111112121111111111.content:
You got Akiza to the hospital and the doctors took her in. When they gave you the results it turned out that she was in a coma and couldn't wake up. You were shocked and left and went to a bar.

Two days later you were still in the bar, drowning your sorrows. Then Yusei came in and grabbed you. Yusei punched you and you punched him back.
"What the hell man?" you asked, drunkingly
"There is someone here to see you." Yusei said
A man and a woman walked into the bar.
"If they want to talk lets go somewhere else."

You went back to your place and the man told you he was Akiza's father and he explained everything. You kept getting the urge to punch Mr Izinski but you held it back. By the time he finished you were sober. You knew you had to help out.

When you got back to the hospital you took Akiza's hand and kissed it. There was a change in her brain patterns but not enough to wake her up. You put your hands on Akiza's cheeks and kissed Akiza on the lips. Still not enough so you poked Akiza's lips with your tongue and they opened but before you could put your tongue in Akiza's mouth, Akiza's tongue went in your mouth. You both kissed passionatly. Then Akiza broke the kiss and said
"Where am I?"
"The hospital," you said "I brought you here two days ago but I was scared that you would never wake up and I ran. But your father convinced me to come back."
"My father?" Akiza asked and you moved and Akiza saw her parents and got angry.
"No, stay away from me."
Akiza got angry and you knew the only way to calm here down was in a duel.
13112111112121111111111.title: At the Hospital

131121111121211111111111.content: Akiza's power was almost completely out of control. Your duel with her was getting very intense. Soon it was Ra vs. Black Rose Dragon. The battle was a titanic one. You knew this would take everything youhad. Just then Akiza's father tried to calm her down. She was having objects thrown at him by Akiza's power. Ra blocked most of them. But in the end Akiza stopped the object from hitting her farther and he embraced her. She told you to end the duel. "The curse of the Black Rose ends now! Ra attack with Blaze Cannon." Ra then attacked Black Rose Dragon. Once the duel was over Akiza said that she was going to fight tghe dark signers with Yusei and the others. You also joined the battle and soon the dark signers something to worry about.
131121111121211111111111.title: The orange sun vs The black rose

1311211111212111111111111.content:
You, Akiza, Jack Atlas, Leo, Luna and Yusei were all at Goodwin's helipad when the helicoptor landed.
"Officer Trudge," said the officer who stepped out "Ready to take off at any time."
"Hope you packed peanuts." you and Yusei said at the same time.
"You again," Trudge said to Yusei "Goodwin what is with this guy? You want him in jail you want him out and now you want me to fly him to the satillite? Well you can just forget it."
Mina went over and talked to Trudge and while she distracted him.
"I can't believe I have to fly economy." said Jack
Yusei told Goodwin that when they were finished Deadulus Bridge would have to be completed.
"Change takes time." Goodwin said
"Then you'll have to find a sixth signer." said Yusei
"...Very well then."
You all boarded the helicoptor.

During the flight you were shaking.
"What's wrong?" Akiza asked
"Let's just say I have a fear of heights." you said
Akiza grabbed your arm and said
"Don't worry, I'm here."
You felt reassured and stopped shaking.
Then you found out about why the city is split in two and about Yusei originally being from the city and Jack being from the Satillite.

When you landed, you landed near a building in the park. When the back opened you saw a man, a woman and two kids at the front door. The woman walked briskly towards you 8.
"Look at you, Jackie boy." said the woman
"Hi Martha." said Jack
"I can't believe how big you've gotten."
"Well it has been quite a while since I left you know."
"Do that thing you used to do. That adorabable prince routine."
Jack looked shocked and Yusei chuckled.
(Watch episode 45 I cannot recreate the comedy of that scene, http://dubhappy.com/yu-gi-oh-5ds-episode...)
After Jack did his prince routine Martha hugged him tightly and Jack complained that he couldn't breath.
There were some really young kids and they walked up to you.
"Hey," you said "I'm (Name), nice to meet you." you stuck out your hand to show you're not a threat and the kids hugged you.

Later everyone sat round for dinner and it was delicious. You were talking about stuff afterwards when Akiza, Luna, Jack, Yusei and you sensed a nearby threat.
1311211111212111111111111.title: Off to the fight.

13112111112121111111111111.content: Just then Lightning struck the ground causing the window to shatter. The glass was shot strait at the kids. You grabbed them and got them out of the way. "Are you alright kids?" you asked. They nodded and told them to stay down. "Who are you?" you asked. Then the man said "My name is Roman and I bear the mark of the spider." Just then everyone gasped at the fact that the vision you all saw was the mark of the spider. He told you that he would leave them alone if you won in a duel. You accepted the terms and ran to your duel runner. Akiza came with you and the three of you went to the center of the satilite. Shortly after the duel began. But unknown to you, three of the kids were fallowing you. Soon Roman had the Spider Web feild spell activated. You knew that you were running out of time before he summons his Earthbound Immortal. But before he ended his turn he used a weak monster to attack you directly. The pain you felt was 100% real. Akiza asked if you were alright. You told her that you were ook and she was releaved. Hust then two of the kids were seen in the flame. Soon Roman summoned Earthbound Immortal Uru. As the kids were turning into light about to be absorbed by Uru, Yusei grabbed the kids and his mark protected them. Uru then attacked you directly but you used a trap card to prevent damage from Uru. But his attack hit a building where Martha was trying to save the thired kid with Trudge. Before Martha slipped she told you to take care of the kids and to also help the others. Then she turned into light and was absorbed by Uru. "MARTHA! NOOO!" you yelled. Then you said "Roman, you're going to pay for that." Just then you dueled with everything you had. Soon you had Ra out on the field. You knew that you couldn't attack Uru so you attacked Roman directly. But instead of hitting Roman you hit one of Yusei's friends. But he was still standing. He then summoned Turbo Cannon and destroyed Uru, causing him to lose the duel.
13112111112121111111111111.title: Mark of the Spider

131121111121211111111111111.content:
Later that night you were with Akiza in the park. You were feeling despair knowing that Roman tricked you into killing an innocent person.
"You didn't kill him," Akiza said "He sacrificed himself."
Just then a dark servant appeared. You dueled him but you couldn't draw Ra. It was as if he wasn't responding to you.

It had been an hour and you were done to 100LP and your opponent still had all 4000LP.
"Roman was right." said the dark servant "You are nothing. You can't even protect your girlfriend. Now I attack you with my monster."
Your LP hit 0.
"(Name)!" yelled Akiza
The dark servant laughed at you.
"(Name)," said Akiza "Please, I love you. Don't die." Akiza cried on you.

Inside your head you saw the empty darkness.
"Am I dead?" you thought to yourself "No, I'm not. I won't give up to this. I'M NOT GOING TO GIVE UP!"

A card in your hand shinined brightly. You got up and showed it to your opponent.
"I activate the effect of J the Phoenix from my hand. When my LP reach 0 I can special summon this card to the field. Then I get to draw five cards and I can special summon all of the monsters I draw."
J the Phoenix appeared on the field and you drew 5 cards. 3 of them were monsters and you special summoned Dark Armed Dragon, Fortune Lady Earth and Jack's Knight.
"Gah," said the Dark Servant "I end my turn with a face down."
"It's my turn." you said and you drew a card "I sacrifice Dark Armed Dragon, Fortune Lady Earth and Jack's Knight to summon out my monster. Oh mighty protector of the sun and sky I beg of thee please heed my cry. Transform thyself from orb of light and bring my victory in this fight. I beesech thee, please grace our humble game but first I shall call up thy name, Winged Dragon of Ra!"
The Winged Dragon of Ra appeared on the field and you attacked and destroyed the Dark Servant.
"How did you do that?" he asked
"Because of the one truth, a phoenix is reborn IN FLAMES!" you said and you were surrounded by fire and blasted it at the Dark Servant but he wasn't hurt but saved and returned to where he was when he got turned.
131121111121211111111111111.title: The One Truth

1311211111212111111111111111.content:
Akiza was amazed at the amount of power you had. But infortunatly the power was too much for your body and you passed out. As you fell Akiza caught you and then Jack and the others showed up as well.


4 hours later...


You had just woken up and your chest was wrapped in bandages. As you looked around you saw Akiza and the kids sitting right beside you.
"Look. He's awake." said one of the kids. Then Akiza gasped and looked at you with happyness.
She embraced you and started to cry. She thought she lost you. You told her that you would never die as long as she stood by you. Then you asked why you had all these bandages on your chest. She then remove them and you saw something on your chest. It was the Mark of Ra. You knew that the dark signers had a great amount of fear towards you. Soon the others joined in and you felt loved and appreciated. But then everyone heard a strong but soothing voice. You knew it was Ra.
"(Name), you now bear my mark on your chest. I hope that you use it to help the signers and save the world." Then the voice disappeared. You knew that you needed to fight with all your might. Then Yusei asks Mina what the Four Stars of Destiny were.
1311211111212111111111111111.title: Gift of Ra

choices: The old Ener-D reactor. Yusei, Crow, Trudge and the twins watch
13112111112121111111111111111.content:
Mina explained that the four stars of destiny are the four main control points for the original Ener-D reactor. They can be deactivated by the four dragons, which will deactivate the Ener-D reactor.
"If you do that then you will only have to fight the guardian's of the stars of destiny." Mina finished
"That means if we do that then Roman won't have to fight us." Yusei said
"No," you said "There are two things wrong with that. One, Roman will try an emergency reboot and two there is no way I'm letting him go."
You put your hand in the middle and said
"We will beat the dark signers, and make the world a better place."

1313.title: Akiza Redo (MY adds Only!)

13131.content:
(You Akiza Sayer) (You look like Sasuke from Naruto Shippuden)

You are Sasuke Uchiha, the last survivor of the Uchiha Clan. It’s been a few years since the incident all those years ago, which killed your family. Your mother, father and brother were lost, along with your home. Ever since then, you have been alone. You were one hell of a duelist though. Your deck was graced by the Winged Dragon of Ra, and you alone could control him. You were born with incredible powers as well, which people feared you because of them. You thought you would be alone for the rest of your life, but that day, your life changed forever. You were walking alone when you had accidentally wandered into a gang’s territory. “Well, what have we here?” one of them said. “Looks like someone is a little lost.” “I don’t want any trouble, let me pass.” “Sorry, but we have a rule here. You want to pass, you have to give us your rarest card.” the leader said. “Back off.” “Come on, hand it over. Before we take it by force.” he said as they surrounded you. “I am warning you.” “Like you could do anything.” one said as he grabbed your arms. “I said back off!” you said as a massive burst of energy came from your body and knocked all of the thugs away from you. “Now get lost!” They thugs were smart enough to run away. “Very impressive.” You turned to see two people. One was a man in some kind of overcoat, the other was a very attractive woman. “Who are you two?” “My name is Sayer, an I am the head of the Arcadia Movement.” “Arcadia Movement?” “Yes, it’s a place where people with powers like yours can be without persecution.” You wanted to get to know the girl, but you had a feeling this guy Sayer had a hidden agenda. “What are we doing standing around here?” Sayer extended his hand and even though you didn’t trust the guy, you shook it to gain his trust. Shortly after that, you all went to the Arcadia Movement building.
13131.title: Chaos Begins

131311.content: Later, you had arrived at the Arcadia Building and Sayer told you that he needed to see your power again, so he had the woman lead you to some sort of machine. She explained that it would analyze your powers. You nodded and soon you were all hooked up to the machine. What it had revealed surprised Sayer beyond belief. His machine couldn’t even calculate the amount of power you possess and you were holding it back. “Incredible. How is this possible?” “I was born with the power of chaos.” “What do you mean by that?” “Sorry, but that information stays with me.” “Fair enough. I look forward to dueling against you later on. But for now, you need a place to rest. Akiza, please show our new friend to his room.” “Of course Sayer.” “Akiza? So that’s her name.” you thought to yourself. You put your shirt back on and followed her to your new room. You could feel the sadness in her heart, the loneliness, and all of her negative emotions. “This is your room.” “Thank you, Akiza.” “I hope you enjoy your stay here, I’m sorry. I ever got your name.” “My name is Sasuke Uchiha. And like you, I know what it means to be alone.” you said as you entered the room. Akiza was confused, but she ignored it for the time being. “Good night, Sasuke.” “Good night Akiza.” She closed the door as she left. You had taken off your duel disk (Look up Chaos Duel Disk for image) and you leaned up against the wall, being this is what you were used to.
131311.title: Your Power

1313111.content: The next day, you woke up to the sun on your face. You needed to get used to walking the halls of the Arcadia Building, so you got dressed, put on your Duel Disk and took a little walk. You had to admit, the place was huge, but you still had an uneasy feeling about this place. But as you were walking, you felt a pain in your head and you began to see images flash before your eyes. All you could make out were two large markings over the Arcadia Building, Sayer taking one hell of an attack, and Akiza dueling against someone. “What the hell? What are these images?” you thought to yourself. But your thoughts were interrupted by Akiza. “Sasuke, Sayer sent me to get you. You alright?” “Yeah, just didn’t sleep well last night. That’s all.” You decided to keep these visions a secret for the time being You and Akiza went to Sayer’s office and he said that he wanted to duel you. “You wish to duel me?” “Yes, I want to see what you can do before Akiza duels in the Fortune Cup.” “Very well. Show me what you can do Sayer.” “I plan to.” The two of you made your way to an area where you could duel without harming others. “The first move belongs to me.” “As you wish.” the two of you said as you activated your duel disks. Akiza watched from another room. But her attention was focused on you. “Like you, I know what it means to be alone. I have nothing but the cards in my deck.” your voice echoed in her head. “Why does it feel like Sasuke understands me on a level no one else could?” she thought to herself. “Alright Sayer, let’s duel!”
1313111.title: The Next Day

13131111.content:
(Skipping to the end)
You used your Wicked Avatar to finish Sayer’s life points without a single point lost. Both Sayer and Akiza were both amazed at your dueling skills. But they also saw the coldest stare they had ever seen in your eyes. “That stare…” she thought to herself. “It’s just like mine.” Sayer struggled standing up for a moment. “Well done Sasuke. You are more than I expected. I never expected your powers to damage me like this.” Your powers shredded his outfit and made a few cuts on his face. You turned around and left the room in silence. Akiza walked up to you, but as you passed her, she somehow felt all of your negative emotions and she felt the coldest chill rush through her body. She watched you walk off and thought to herself “Sasuke…what could you have gone through to give off that much negative emotion?” “Akiza.” She snapped out of her thoughts and she turned towards him. “Yes Sayer?” “I want you to do me a little favor. Tell Sasuke that he will come with us to the Fortune Cup. I need to get more information on him.” “Alright.” she said as she walked off after you. But as she did this, Sayer thought to himself “As soon as I get Sasuke to join my army, there will be no need for Akiza anymore.”
13131111.title: The Duel Ends

131311111.content: Akiza searched your room, but found that you weren’t there. So she ended up randomly searching the building. Soon, she found you standing in front of large window. “Sasuke?” You looked at the reflection in the window. “Akiza. Is there something you need?” “Sayer wanted me to tell you that you will come with the two of us to the Fortune Cup.” “I see. He wants more information on my powers huh?” Akiza was surprised that you knew that was what Sayer wanted. “Very well then. I will give him the information he wants.” you said as you walked passed her. “Sasuke.” You stopped walking and turned towards her. “If you ever need someone to talk to, you know you can talk to me or Sayer.” “I would prefer talking to you than him. And the same goes for you, you can talk to me if you need it Akiza.” You needed to know what Sayer had up his sleeve. Later, you bumped into Sayer and gave him the information he wanted. But you asked him why he wanted to know so much about your power. “I will tell you, but only if you swear not to breath a word about this to anyone else.” You nodded and he told you he was building a psychic army. He said that the Arcadia Movement was just a means to an end. “And Akiza?” “She was my greatest find, well until I found you that is.” “I see. And what happens when someone doesn’t meet your expectations? I know you have a standard for recruitment.” “Very clever. They are sent to an unknown location which is always moving. In other words I have no idea where those who failed to meet m expectations are at this point.” “And what of Akiza?” “Well, I will keep her around until she has outlived her usefulness.” When he said that you wanted to blow him to kingdom come, but Akiza would never forgive you if you did. You knew his time would come at the hands of whatever was in your vision. “I have one request Sayer.” “And that is?” “Even if she ’outlives her usefulness’ as you call it, I want Akiza to stay here at the Arcadia Movement, with me.” “I see you have taken a liking to her. Very well.” But in that moment, Akiza came in and said she was ready for the fortune cup. “I will get ready myself.” you said as you left the room. Akiza was extremely concerned about you at this point. Back in your room, you had pulled out a type of tape recorder made from your own energy from your deck holder. “That bastard uses anyone he can find.” you thought to yourself. “I will spare her this information for now. But I got a bad feeling that this Fortune Cup is just a small part of the bigger picture.” Soon, you, Sayer and Akiza went to the Fortune Cup.
131311111.title: Sayer's Plan

1313111111.content:
(I’m just doing a summary here)
You had watched Akiza go through the Fortune Cup up to her duel with Yusei Fudo. In their duel, not only did he get through to her, but with your powers, you managed to talk to her with telepathy and with two people getting through to her in a way Sayer never could, she couldn’t help but cry in the end. But during the duel between Jack Atlas and Yusei, you, Akiza and Luna were dragged into a vision of a gigantic spider marking covering Satellite, similar to the vision you had of the Arcadia Building. And you felt the worst was yet to come, and that night, you would feel a darkness like no other.
1313111111.title: The Fortune Cup

13131111111.content:
(Misty Luna Jack)

Later that night, you felt like Sayer’s plans have gone on long enough. You decided it was time to take things into your own hands. But the building began to shake as if an earthquake hit only this building. You had to act fast. You first went to the location where Sayer had the old geezer and the man named Tanner were locked up. “Who are you?” Tanner asked. “My name is Sasuke Uchiha. And you two are free. Go, get Leo and Luna out of here.” The two of them agreed and you told them where they were. But the building was shaking more violently than before. “I need to get Akiza out of here.” You ran through the halls as fast as you could and you soon found her dueling someone with a massive amount of dark energy coming from her. “Akiza!” you said running towards her. “Sasuke, you have to get out of here. She’s a dark signer!” “A dark signer?” “Yes, and I know you are on Akiza’s side, which makes you my enemy as well.” “Hold on, what are you talking about?” “Enough.” She said as she and Akiza continued their duel. But up above, Sayer was facing a dark signer as well. There was no doubt this was what your visions warned you about. But not too long after that, Luna and the others showed up. You noticed this and said “All of you need to get out of here!” “What about you?” “I am staying with Akiza.” “Sasuke…” “Oh how sweet. But I have to cut it short. It’s my move. Now I sacrifice my monster to summon Earthbound Immortal Ccarayhua!" Nothing seemed to happen. “So where is this monster?” “Look behind you.” Both you and Akiza looked and saw a massive eye looking at you. “What the hell is that thing?!” But in that moment, the floor above was blown sky high and Sayer fell down below. “Sayer!” The building began to collapse around you. “It seems we have to finish this another time.” she said as she left. Parts of the building crashed down on top of you and Akiza. You used your powers to keep the two of you safe from getting killed. “Akiza are you alright?” “S-Sasuke, I’m alright thanks to you.” “Come on, we need to get out of here!” you said as you picked her up. Using your powers, you managed to get out of there before it was too late. You looked at Akiza and noticed she passed out. It was obvious that all of this was too much for her. You soon ran into Jack on his runner. “Sasuke, is Akiza alright?” “She’s fine. She’s just passed out. We need some answers. We need so see Goodwin.” “Alright, if you have a ride, follow me.” “Got it.” you said as you went over to an abandoned building and came out in a runner of your own design. You followed Jack to Goodwin’s where Yusei, Leo, Luna, Mina and Trudge were waiting.
13131111111.title: Rise of the Dark Signers

You grin and extend a hand towards Cathy. "Ladies first!" Sure, it could be dangerous, letting her go first. You didn't know her, and, more importantly, you didn't know her deck. But the Photon Galaxy had never failed you before so why would it fail you now?

Cathy smirked as she drew her card with a flourish. "My, what a gentleman. Too bad that politeness will be your undoing!" She glanced down at her cards and picked one out. "I activate the continuous spell Cat Meeting! This allows me to special summon a 'Cat' or 'Neko' monster from my hand whenever I normal summon one!" She slid the card into a slot on her duel disk and a larger version of it appeared in front of her. She proceeded to take one of her other cards and slammed it onto her duel disk. "Now I'll summon Stray Cat in Attack Mode! And due to Cat Meeting, I can special summon another Stray Cat in Attack Mode!"

Two cats, one patterned white with black splotches and the other a mangy brown, appeared on her field, facing away from you. Their effects practically forced you out of attacking, but with only 100 ATK points each, they were about as threatening as a wet paper bag.

Cathy slid another card into her duel disk. "I'll end my turn with a facedown! Your move, pet!"

You drew your card, and gasped at your luck. 'Just the thing I nee for an OTK!' You actually start laughing at your ridiculous luck, so much so that your 'companions' actually start complaining. "Hey! What's so funny?!" Cathy asks. You look up, a wicked smirk on your face. "Oh, nothing really. Let's just say that your cats won't be the only pussies I'm gonna pound!" You're certain that, had you made that joke to anyone else, you would've been smacked.

Eager to end this duel, you grab the cards in your hand that you needed. "First, since my field is empty, I can special summon Photon Thrasher directly from my hand!" As the card touched your disk, a giant robot with a slight blue glow on its body appeared in front of you, wielding a giant sword. You continue, sliding a spell into your disk and slamming another monster onto the field.

"Next, I activate Photon Lead, letting me special summon a Level 4 or lower LIGHT-attribute monster from my hand! C'mon, Photon Crusher!" A glowing lasso appeared on the field, looping itself around another card in your hand and pulling it to the field. Photon Crusher appeared in the ropes loop, an once the rope vanished, it swung its double-ended club in the air.

Cathy glared at your monsters. "They look tough, but unfortunately for you, my Stray Cats' effects mean you can't attack!" You smirk again. "I'm not one yet!" She gasps as you make another play.

Your monsters glow as you remove them from your duel disk. "I sacrifice my two monsters in order to summon..." Your monsters vanish in a flash of light, replaced by a large figure in blue and gold armor. "Photon Caesar! And my Caesar has an effect! When he's normal summoned, I can special summon another Photon Caesar from my deck!" The armored figure glowed white and split into two.

You heard gasps and turned to your audience, having forgotten they existed. They both had their hands over their mouths, your impressive display having distracted them from distracting you. You laugh a bit. "Impressive, right? An the fun still isn't over!" They turn to you, the look in their eyes one of wonder. How could you possibly continue from an already strong opening move? Maybe like this!

You grab one of the last two cards in your hand, sliding it into your duel disk. "Now I activate Photon Sanctuary! This spell summons two Photon Tokens to my field, but they're immediately leaving so I can summon my ace!"

Two blue balls of electricity appeared on either side of your field, right before flying next to you and merging together. They grew and changed colors, turning into a large, red, vaguely trident shape. You grasp one of the three spikes and tug. Immediately, the shape begins spinning, a tornado kicking up from it. You couldn't help yourself. You began chuckling again. Cathy growled and yelled at you, something about how you still couldn't attack. You weren't listening. You were enjoying the moment. In one move, Cathy would be wide open, and then... Then, you four would have some REAL fun!

“Oh about what” Téa asked curiously?

“N-nothing” you explained starting to blush which causes Téa to laugh.

“You really are a ham” Téa teases as she continues to laugh.

“I am not! Let’s just hurry up and get you into the elevator” you growl turning away.

“Heh alright one last piggy back ride for the night” Téa chuckles as you help her onto your back. You walk inside with little trouble, only stopping for a moment because you had to open the double doors. You walk inside to find the place relatively dark and eerie but since you didn’t mind dark places like this you felt a little at home. It was then that you felt Téa’s grip around you tighten a little bit around your chest. She seemed to be shaking a bit ‘Was she afraid of the dark?’ you wondered as you continued walking.

About five minutes later you had arrived at Tea’s apartment and, after another few minutes of carrying Tea to her bedroom and running to fetch some bandages from the bathroom, you manage to wrap her wounded ankle. However just as you were about to leave Tea stops you

“Wait…” Tea pleads sounding a little desperate “…please don’t go!” You…
1512.title: A huge dance studio (Téa)

152.content:
(You Tea Alexis Akiza Sherry Blackheart) (You look like Sasuke from Naruto Shippuden)

You are Sasuke Uchiha, one of the top duelists of your time. You were the only person in the world to hold an Egyptian God Card in your deck. But you hardly ever had to use it. But about ten years ago, your clan was destroyed by a demon named Blackheart, who was an inhabitant of the Shadow Realm. You swore to get revenge against him no matter what. And with the help of your powers, you would do just that. One day, you were chasing Blackheart in your duel runner which was modeled after the Blue-Eyes White Dragon and were using your powers to try and send him off the bike. But no matter how hard you tried, you could not hit him. "Come on Sasuke, you will have to do much better than that." "Shut up!" you said sending a massive lightning bolt his way. This time you sent it right in front of him, which sent both him and his runner off the road. "Now you're mine!" you said as you followed him off-road. You followed him down to the bottom of the ravine and you got off your runner. "It's time to end this." you said walking towards him, creating the Chidori in your hand. "Oh, this is far from over." "What?" you said as you stopped walking towards him. "Look!" he said as he created three portals that showed three diferent times. "I have sent out my clones to duel four of the greatest female duelists in all of history. and when they are defeated, I will send them to the Shadow Realm!" "Blackheart! This is between you and me, leave them out of this!" "Oh, I'm afraid I can't do that." "And why is that?!" you said as you sent more power into your chidori. He began to laugh and said "Because, I lured them all together so I can bring them to you!" he said as he snapped his fingers. You looked at the portals and the blackheart clones surrendered the duel and they created portals to your time as well. Each of them were sucked in by the force created by the portals. Two of them came flying towards you and you caught them both, even though it sent you sliding a bit. And two more came out on duel runners, who managed to hit the brakes just before they hit the wall. "Whats going on?" "One minute we are dueling some freak and the next we end up here." "Listen, I can explain all of this later. Right now we have to deal with him." you said looking at Blackheart. "Now now Sasuke, you and I will have our battle, but for now, I bid you farewell" he said as he got on his runner and rode ontop of the ocean waters. All four girls were extremely confused as to what just happened, and they figured that you were the guy to turn to. You helped two of them up and asked if they were alright. "Yeah, we're fine." "Thanks for the save there." "No problem. Now I know you all have questions, so you might want to follow me to my home." "You seem to know what is going on, so we will go with you." "You think you two can spare a ride for these two?" "Sure. Hop on." Two of them got on the other runners and you led them to a path that led them back to your home.
152.title: Chaos Begins
